item.description:
Outside New Haven City Hall, on Church Street across from the Green, Elm City Cycling will be hosting their Bike to Work Day..

From 7:30-9:30 come for:
A free breakfast, brought to you by Koffee on Orange and members of Elm City Cycling..
Pick up free helpful information and bike accessories.
Chat with fellow cyclists about best commuting routes.

Contact bikenewhaven@gmail.com or visit www.elmcitycycling.org for more information or to get a commuting buddy.

Although this event is free,please consider donating a few bucks at the event.

HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!!
item.name: Bike to Work Breakfast
